summary: This document is a Closing Protection Letter from First American Title Insurance Company outlining the terms and conditions under which the company agrees to reimburse losses incurred during real estate transactions in North Carolina. It specifies the responsibilities of the Issuing Agent or Approved Attorney and the limitations of liability for the company.

keyFacts: The document outlines the terms under which First American Title Insurance Company agrees to reimburse losses related to real estate transactions.
It specifies that the coverage is limited to transactions conducted by an Issuing Agent or Approved Attorney.
The letter emphasizes the importance of compliance with written closing instructions.
Claims must be made within three years from the date of closing to be valid.
The coverage offered is specific to real property transactions in North Carolina.
